Headline: #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Reroute near Harlem/Archer
ShortDescription: 62H Archer/Harlem buses temp. rerouted EB: 63rd, Narragansett, and Archer; WB: Archer, Narragansett, and 63rd due to, street blockage near Harlem/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harlem/Archer, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Narragansett, and Archer.

Westbound buses will operate via Archer, Narragansett, and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
